title: Hi, my google pixel 3 was just stolen. It was turned off, if they take the sim card and ...
content: My phone was stolen and using google maps on location sharing I could track my last location on my husbands phone but they have turned the phone off. If they turn it back on again and take the sim card out, will it still update the location or will it need to be connected to wifi? Also is it easy for the thief to reset factory settings. I am hoping they will turn it on and we can track them!
